subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kurt Busch, the 2004 Nascar Nextel Cup champion, has recorded five of his seven top-10 finishes in the last five races.
snippet: Kurt Busch, the 2004 Nascar Nextel Cup champion, has recorded five of his seven top-10 finishes in the last five races.
